A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: Terrible movie\, It makes me sad to see Star Wars heading in a direction akin to Marvel. In a franchise where people used to have to work hard to achieve things some characters are handed incredible powers on a platter\, how can I sympathise. Luke's character is completely miss used\, many emotional moments are thrown away with terrible jokes. Lore is completely ignored to get back to the haha rebels vs empire nostalgia. I have tried to like this movie but I cannot. But oh well this financial model works so strap yourself in for endless progressively worse remakes.
